name: gesturePad
body:
### gesturePad

gesturePad is a gesture based remote control application for controlling device's with an http API. Run on iOS 6+, iPhone, iTouch and iPad.

Currently controls MediaBrowser 2 (mb3 in testing), eventghost and DirecTV natively. Also tested with insteon devices, and is totally extendable to any device using custom xml file.

Everything is extendable from adding new actions, or by creating and modifying custom gestures.

![front](http://i.imgur.com/ZjReaWa.jpg)

[More Screenshots](http://imgur.com/a/NstDZ#0)

### gesturePad
**Setup (required)**
soon
**Features**
Offine mode, image caching, Multiple rooms / devices, local DB, volume slider with repeat, gesture list.

### MediaBrowser 
**Setup (required)**
Install the WebAPI for MB2.

**Features**
Time shifting, library browsing, List view, resuming, imdb lookup, navigation.

### Eventghost Setup

**Setup (required)**
You will need to setup eventghost with the webserver plugin to allow remote control. Sample eventghost config can be found here:

**Features**
Whatever you can do with eventghost, you can fire from gesturePad. :-)

### IR Blaster

**Setup (optional)**
Buy an old MCE2005, IR bundle or usbIRT I suppose. Wire up the baster from your HTPC to your TV using an IR cable from the MCE remote bundle, you can also control your television from gesturePad. 

**Features**
Control your television from gesturePad. Volume, Power, Switching inputs.. anything your remote does you can setup gesturePad. :-)

### DirecTV

**Setup (optional)**
If you have DirecTV in your home, then you can control that as will through gesturePad. Simply enter the IP address into the settings.app on your iOS device. 

**Features**
Channel guide, with now playing information, cross referenced with tvdb.com. All navigation commands. List view. Logo view.

### Insteon

**Setup (optional)**
Get a device and a controller. I am currently controlling light switches and my fireplace.

**Features**
Turn on or off an appliance, from your iphone by gesture or list view.
